extendedInfo.description: Use your incredible wits, fantastic skills and/or magnificent strength to choose your way out of a heavily guarded prison! Reveal the secrets of the dungeon, meet the mysterious co-prisoner and determine who's responsible for your arrest. Grab your gear and prepare yourself for a hard fantasy quest. Remember, escaping from a prison is not a task for kids or grannies!

reviews.title: Fun,funny,awesome!
reviews.comment: The game is fun,funny,and awesome! I beat it. But,the guard that brings you to your cell is gay!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I would\'ve given it five stars of it weren\'t for the terrible grammar in this game. I managed to make my character escape the prison!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very nice, indeed.
reviews.comment: great game! however, learn how to write in english... but, still readeable.
reviews.author: Kamil Osoba

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Worst english grammar - EVER.  I could not put up with reading something that sounds like a ten year old wrote it. I will give 2 stars for potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I keep getting innocent though. But that just makes me play more. I love games like this. Has some typos but nothing glaring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is definetly a fun read, I would recomend it to anyone, really. :D
reviews.author: Ashley Kozlowski

reviews.title: Illiterate author
reviews.comment: This is written by someone completely illiterate of the English language.  Awful.
reviews.author: Lane Chevrier

reviews.title: Weird and bugged
reviews.comment: This game looks bugged. Even with time skill, when you can see how much time you have left, the trial simply starts after 2-3 days what severely limits what you can do. Character building is totally illogical and you have to do trial and error choices to becone magic user for example.
reviews.author: Martin Ben\304\215a

reviews.title: Okay..
reviews.comment: It\'s a captivating story, I though I would go out of my norm and just have fun with the choices given to me. I did for about two minutes I died right of the bat!.. the thing is for me to go all the way with this story I feel force to choose the options that I don\'t want to... If I want to be careless and stupid or powerful and thick headed!.. I should have that freedom right?.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s really fun. Though I\'m too lazy to find other endings, the ones I had so far was kissing the rat and him turning into a knight and being let out, dying of lack of sleep, proved innocent, and sentenced to death. The narrator is hilarious and the comments received from actions are entertaining. Like when picking \'Nothing\' for your pelvis area, or putting \'What?\'. It was a fun game, though I don\'t know how to do the magic portal or escape.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple Fun
reviews.comment: Amusing and time consuming... Best of the \'Hosted Games\'
reviews.author: Amauri Rodriguez

reviews.title: No mames wei q piensas
reviews.comment: I love how u can chose ur name at first I was sexy then karcher then no mames wei q piensas. I like it when he decided to call me stupid though it was pretty funny
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It was an interesting idea but it\'s redundant and linear and there are some grammar errors.
reviews.author: Sam Young

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Gets confusing when trying to escape. Can\'t tell where the hell your going. I ran in circles for 10 min. Drove me nuts. Won\'t b playing a second time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Sure it needs some work on grammar, but I showed it to,my friend and we play it all the time! Very fun if you don\'t hate reading. I suggest you download it
reviews.author: Andie Penna

reviews.title: NoobcommanderOh
reviews.comment: Great app. Still love em all :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great story beings back novels the way they are fun! Keep it up :)
reviews.author: Cory K
